name: MrBristles
0:
”Alexa, ask Mr. Bristles to help me brush.”
”Alexa, ask Mr. Bristles to start a timer.”
”Alexa, ask Mr. Bristles to read the Toothbrushing Poem”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mr. bristles
des: Just ask Mr. Bristles to "start a timer" or "help me brush" to activate a two-minute timer with 10-second notices and instruction for how to switch things up. Ask Mr. Bristles to "read the Toothbrushing Poem" for an enthralling teeth brushing journey spanning the length of your toothbrushing. Who says dental hygiene has to be boring?
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
